1.name: The Departed
1.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

2.name: The Prestige
2.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

3.name: Casino Royale
3.description: Armed with a license to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007, and must defeat a private banker to terrorists in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro, but things are not what they seem.

4.name: Pan's Labyrinth
4.description: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

5.name: Children of Men
5.description: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

6.description: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

7.name: Apocalypto
7.description: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

8.name: The Devil Wears Prada
8.description: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

9.name: The Lives of Others
9.description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

10.name: Cars
10.description: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

11.name: Eragon
11.description: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realizes he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

12.name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
12.description: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

13.name: Idiocracy
13.description: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes five centuries in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive.

14.name: Lady in the Water
14.description: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

15.name: Little Miss Sunshine
15.description: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

16.name: Happy Feet
16.description: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

17.name: Mission: Impossible III
17.description: IMF Agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancee in response.

18.name: Blood Diamond
18.description: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

19.name: Alpha Dog
19.description: Johnny and a couple pals kidnap Jake's 15-year-old brother, Zach, then assigns his buddy Frankie to be Zach's minder. They develop a brotherly friendship. Zach parties with his captors as things begin to spin out of control.

20.name: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
20.description: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

21.name: The Black Dahlia
21.description: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

22.name: Inside Man
22.description: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

23.name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
23.description: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

24.name: X-Men: The Last Stand
24.description: The human government develops a cure for mutations, and Jean Gray becomes a darker uncontrollable persona called the Phoenix who allies with Magneto, causing escalation into an all-out battle for the X-Men.

25.name: The Pursuit of Happyness
25.description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

26.name: Rocky Balboa
26.description: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight; against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

27.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
27.description: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

28.name: The Holiday
28.description: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

29.name: The Da Vinci Code
29.description: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

30.name: Night at the Museum
30.description: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

31.name: She's the Man
31.description: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for one of his soccer teammates, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

32.name: Babel
32.description: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

33.name: John Tucker Must Die
33.description: Three ex-girlfriends of a serial cheater set up their former lover to fall for the new girl in town so they can watch him get his heart broken.

34.name: The Benchwarmers
34.description: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children baseball squads.

35.name: The Hills Have Eyes
35.description: A suburban American family is being stalked by a group of psychotic people who live in the desert, far away from civilization.

36.name: Deja Vu
36.description: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an A.T.F. agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber, but soon finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims.

37.name: Superman Returns
37.description: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

38.name: Basic Instinct 2
38.description: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

39.name: Miami Vice
39.description: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

40.name: The Last King of Scotland
40.description: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s.

41.name: We Are Marshall
41.description: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

42.name: The Fall
42.description: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story of five mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

43.name: The Break-Up
43.description: In a bid to keep their luxurious condo from their significant other, a couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment.

44.name: Click
44.description: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

45.name: The Illusionist
45.description: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

46.name: Crank
46.description: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.

47.name: The Fountain
47.description: As a modern-day scientist, Tommy is struggling with mortality, desperately searching for the medical breakthrough that will save the life of his cancer-stricken wife, Izzi.

48.name: Little Children
48.description: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations in suburban Massachusetts.

49.name: Marie Antoinette
49.description: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen, and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

50.name: The Good Shepherd
50.description: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.
